name: PDO.prepare
purpose: Prepares a statement for execution and returns a statement object

return.description:
If the database server successfully prepares the statement,
   PDO::prepare returns a
   PDOStatement object.
   If the database server cannot successfully prepare the statement,
   PDO::prepare returns FALSE or emits
   PDOException (depending on error handling).Emulated prepared statements does not communicate with the database server
    so PDO::prepare does not check the statement.
